description:
An impressive address and a contemporary family retreat that will surpass all expectations; this exceptional home offers the very best of high-end living. Situated on 913sqm with full perimeter fencing, the expansive house design offers 708sqm of internal living space and has been architecturally designed and professionally landscaped to offer a tranquil oasis.

Set back behind the rendered wall with electric gates and intercom pedestrian entry the striking two-level house boasts an incredible floorplan suited to a large family or multi-generations living together. It features five bedrooms, all with private bathroom and walk in robes, multiple living areas, a dedicated office, an enviable entertainment zone with pool, plus triple garage and off-street parking, top security and abundant storage, there is everything you could ever wish for right here!

• Low maintenance design with large concreted forecourt and towering front entry into an elegant, hotel-grade foyer with void ceiling and three suspended chandeliers.
• The interior decor is simply divine and on-trend with subtle wallpaper, premium flooring and a perfect blend of raw materials to complement each other including glass, timber and tile.
• Home office with purpose built- cabinetry offering desk area for computer set up.
• Downstairs master bedroom at front of house offering seclusion and peace for older generations, it is extra spacious with designer bathroom and big walk in robe.
• Central media room for home movies has top-grade carpetes, built-in speakers and a bank of cabinetry to host all your media equipment and screens.
• Fantastic family games room is super-sized for billiards and comes complete with built-in bar for parties and functions as it opens onto the outdoor covered patio area.
• Impeccably designed and presented open-plan living, dining and kitchen zone that seamlessly connects to the pool/patio via concertina folding doors. This luxurious space comprises ample room for comfortable lounges and large table settings for everyday use with all the household.
• 5-star kitchen for gourmet chefs has a host of glossy cabinetry with sleek black benches, massive island for seating and socialising and equipped with gas cooker, two ovens, built- in coffee machine and microwave. A concealed Butler's pantry has a plumbed sink and provides amazing storage.
• Incredible alfresco patio with quality tiling surrounding the resort-like pool with water feature and glass fencing. This large covered area is sublime for entertaining with a bespoke kitchen cabinetry for catering and flows to the low-care gardens.
• Polished timber flooring upstairs open to a huge lounge room and connects to the four bedrooms on this level, all with walk in robes and ensuite.

• The master bedroom includes a massive back deck that overlooks the pool and garden. A feature wall conceals the extensive fitted robe with full cabinetry and the deluxe bathroom with freestanding tub, long vanity and private double shower.

Located in one of the most sought-after streets of Sunnybank, Lister Street enjoys all the premium attributes of this exclusive neighbourhood coupled with superb convenience. Only 1.8km walk to Market Square, and with 123 and 135 bus stops on the doorstep, a short walk to the train station and 5 minutes onto the motorway access to the CBD and surrounds is so simple! Nearby there are quality schools, sporting clubs and community centres, churches and a plethora of entertainment, eateries, retailers and restaurants to enjoy.

Almost too good to be true - this top quality property will be a hot ticket for big families ready to buy now! Don't delay your inspection of this spectacular home.

**All information contained herein is gathered from sources we consider to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided and interested parties must solely rely on their own enquiries**
